mn33:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn33:2.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako abhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
mn33:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, gopālako na rūpaññū hoti, na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti, na āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti, na vaṇaṁ paṭicchādetā hoti, na dhūmaṁ kattā hoti, na titthaṁ jānāti, na pītaṁ jānāti, na vīthiṁ jānāti,
mn33:2.3_1: na gocarakusalo hoti anavasesadohī ca hoti.
mn33:2.3_2: Ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:2.4_1: ekādasahi aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako abhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
mn33:3.1_1: ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjituṁ.
mn33:3.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti, na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti, na āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti, na vaṇaṁ paṭicchādetā hoti, na dhūmaṁ kattā hoti, na titthaṁ jānāti, na pītaṁ jānāti, na vīthiṁ jānāti, na gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohī ca hoti.
mn33:3.3_1: Ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti?
mn33:4.2_1: bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ sabbaṁ rūpaṁ ‘cattāri mahābhūtāni,
mn33:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti.
mn33:6.2_2: nappajahati na vinodeti na byantī karoti na anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:6.2_3: Uppannaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ …pe… uppannaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ …pe… uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme adhivāseti,
mn33:6.2_4: nappajahati na vinodeti na byantī karoti na anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:7.2_1: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī.
mn33:7.3_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
mn33:7.3_1: tassa saṁvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati cakkhundriyaṁ,
mn33:7.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī.
mn33:7.9_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
mn33:7.9_1: tassa saṁvarāya na paṭipajjati, na rakkhati manindriyaṁ,
mn33:8.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhūmaṁ kattā hoti?
mn33:8.2_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ na vitthārena paresaṁ desetā hoti.
mn33:8.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhūmaṁ kattā hoti.
mn33:9.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na titthaṁ jānāti?
mn33:9.2_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
mn33:9.2_2: te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā na paripucchati, na paripañhati:
mn33:9.5_0: Tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva na vivaranti,
mn33:9.5_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhānīyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ na paṭivinodenti.
mn33:9.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na titthaṁ jānāti.
mn33:10.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pītaṁ jānāti?
mn33:10.2_1: bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne na labhati atthavedaṁ, na labhati dhammavedaṁ,
mn33:10.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pītaṁ jānāti.
mn33:11.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vīthiṁ jānāti?
mn33:11.2_1: bhikkhu ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
mn33:11.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vīthiṁ jānāti.
mn33:12.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti?
mn33:12.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti.
mn33:13.2_2: tatra bhikkhu mattaṁ na jānāti paṭiggahaṇāya.
mn33:13.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anavasesadohī hoti.
mn33:14.1_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti?
mn33:14.2_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā,
mn33:14.2_2: tesu na mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca;
mn33:14.3_0: na mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca;
mn33:14.4_0: na mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca.
mn33:14.5_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:14.6_1: ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjituṁ.
mn33:15.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako bhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
mn33:15.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, gopālako rūpaññū hoti, lakkhaṇakusalo hoti, āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti, vaṇaṁ paṭicchādetā hoti, dhūmaṁ kattā hoti, titthaṁ jānāti, pītaṁ jānāti, vīthiṁ jānāti, gocarakusalo hoti, sāvasesadohī ca hoti.
mn33:15.3_1: Ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā te atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:15.4_1: ekādasahi aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako bhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
mn33:16.1_1: ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjituṁ.
mn33:16.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpaññū hoti, lakkhaṇakusalo hoti, āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti, vaṇaṁ paṭicchādetā hoti, dhūmaṁ kattā hoti, titthaṁ jānāti, pītaṁ jānāti, vīthiṁ jānāti, gocarakusalo hoti, sāvasesadohī ca hoti.
mn33:16.3_1: Ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:17.2_1: bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ sabbaṁ rūpaṁ ‘cattāri mahābhūtāni,
mn33:17.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpaññū hoti.
mn33:18.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu lakkhaṇakusalo hoti.
mn33:19.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti?
mn33:19.2_2: pajahati vinodeti byantī karoti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:19.2_3: Uppannaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ …pe… uppannaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ …pe… uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti,
mn33:19.2_4: pajahati vinodeti byantī karoti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:19.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti.
mn33:20.2_1: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
mn33:20.3_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṁ,
mn33:20.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
mn33:20.9_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati manindriyaṁ, manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjati.
mn33:21.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhūmaṁ kattā hoti?
mn33:21.2_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ desetā hoti.
mn33:21.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhūmaṁ kattā hoti.
mn33:22.2_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati, paripañhati:
mn33:22.5_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhānīyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti.
mn33:22.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu titthaṁ jānāti.
mn33:23.2_1: bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammavedaṁ,
mn33:23.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pītaṁ jānāti.
mn33:24.2_1: bhikkhu ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
mn33:24.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vīthiṁ jānāti.
mn33:25.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gocarakusalo hoti.
mn33:26.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sāvasesadohī hoti.
mn33:27.1_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā, te atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti?
mn33:27.2_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā tesu mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca;
mn33:27.3_0: mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca;
mn33:27.4_0: mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca.
mn33:27.5_1: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:27.6_1: ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjitun”ti.
mn33:27.8_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
